title: Fix set_categories deprecation in 09_tabular.ipynb and clean/09_tabulâ€¦
body:
original: df['ProductSize'].cat.set_categories(sizes, ordered=True, inplace=True)

after:
df['ProductSize'] = df['ProductSize'].cat.set_categories(sizes, ordered=True)

title: Inplace = True is no longer supported in set_categories in pandas in chapter 9: tabular
body:
Original: df['ProductSize'].cat.set_categories(sizes, ordered=True, inplace=True) 

should be replaced with

df['ProductSize'] = df['ProductSize'].cat.set_categories(sizes, ordered=True)
